code:
// visualizations.js
const distritosCrData={"name":"Costa Rica","children":[{"name":"San José","children":[/* ... */]},{"name":"Alajuela","children":[/* ... */]},{"name":"Cartago","children":[/* ... */]},{"name":"Heredia","children":[/* ... */]},{"name":"Guanacaste","children":[/* ... */]},{"name":"Puntarenas","children":[/* ... */]},{"name":"Limón","children":[/* ... */]}]};const flareData={"name":"flare","children":[/* ... */]};const vueData={"name":"vue","children":[/* ... */]};function generateUID(){return'uid-'+Math.random().toString(36).substr(2,9);}// Function to draw a Treemap
function drawTreemap(data,elementId){console.log("Drawing Treemap for:",elementId,data);const width=800;const height=600;const root=d3.hierarchy(data).sum(d=>d.size).sort((a,b)=>b.height-a.height||b.value-a.value);d3.treemap().size([width,height]).padding(2).round(true)(root);const svg=d3.select(elementId).append("svg").attr("width",width).attr("height",height).style("font","12px sans-serif");console.log("SVG element created for Treemap:",elementId);const cell=svg.selectAll("g").data(root.leaves()).join("g").attr("transform",d=>"translate(".concat(d.x0,",").concat(d.y0,")"));cell.append("rect").attr("id",d=>generateUID()).attr("fill",d=>d3.interpolateViridis(d.value/root.value)).attr("stroke","#fff").attr("stroke-width",1).attr("width",d=>d.x1-d.x0).attr("height",d=>d.y1-d.y0);cell.append("clipPath").attr("id",d=>generateUID()).append("use").attr("xlink:href",d=>'#'+d.leafUid);cell.append("text").attr("clip-path",d=>"url(#".concat(d.clipUid,")")).selectAll("tspan").data(d=>d.data.name.split(/(?=[A-Z][^A-Z])/g)).join("tspan").attr("x",3).attr("y",(d,i)=>"".concat(1.1+i*1.1,"em")).text(d=>d).attr("fill","white");console.log("Treemap drawn for:",elementId);}// Function to draw a Radial layout
function drawRadial(data,elementId){console.log("Drawing Radial for:",elementId,data);const width=800;const height=600;const radius=Math.min(width,height)/2-10;const root=d3.hierarchy(data).sum(d=>d.size);const tree=d3.tree().size([2*Math.PI,radius]);tree(root);const svg=d3.select(elementId).append("svg").attr("width",width).attr("height",height).append("g").attr("transform","translate(".concat(width/2,",").concat(height/2,")"));console.log("SVG element created for Radial:",elementId);const link=svg.append("g").selectAll("path").data(root.links()).join("path").attr("fill","none").attr("stroke","#ccc").attr("stroke-opacity",0.8).attr("stroke-width",1.5).attr("d",d3.linkRadial().angle(d=>d.x).radius(d=>d.y));const node=svg.append("g").selectAll("g").data(root.descendants()).join("g").attr("transform",d=>"\n            rotate(".concat(d.x*180/Math.PI-90,")\n            translate(").concat(d.y,",0)\n        "));node.append("circle").attr("fill",d=>d.children?"#555":"#999").attr("r",4);node.append("text").attr("dy","0.31em").attr("x",d=>d.x<Math.PI===!d.children?6:-6).attr("text-anchor",d=>d.x<Math.PI===!d.children?"start":"end").attr("transform",d=>d.x>=Math.PI?"rotate(180)":null).text(d=>d.data.name).attr("fill","#333");console.log("Radial drawn for:",elementId);}// Function to draw a Partition layout
function drawPartition(data,elementId){console.log("Drawing Partition for:",elementId,data);const width=800;const height=600;const root=d3.hierarchy(data).sum(d=>d.size).sort((a,b)=>b.height-a.height||b.value-a.value);d3.partition().size([height,width]).padding(2).round(true)(root);const svg=d3.select(elementId).append("svg").attr("width",width).attr("height",height).style("font","12px sans-serif");console.log("SVG element created for Partition:",elementId);const cell=svg.selectAll("g").data(root.descendants()).join("g").attr("transform",d=>"translate(".concat(d.y0,",").concat(d.x0,")"));cell.append("rect").attr("width",d=>d.y1-d.y0).attr("height",d=>d.x1-d.x0).attr("fill",d=>d3.interpolateViridis(d.value/root.value)).attr("stroke","#fff").attr("stroke-width",1);cell.append("text").attr("x",4).attr("y",13).text(d=>d.data.name).attr("fill","white");console.log("Partition drawn for:",elementId);}// Function to draw a Circle Packing layout
function drawCirclePacking(data,elementId){console.log("Drawing Circle Packing for:",elementId,data);const width=800;const height=800;const root=d3.hierarchy(data).sum(d=>d.size).sort((a,b)=>b.value-a.value);d3.pack().size([width,height]).padding(2)(root);const svg=d3.select(elementId).append("svg").attr("width",width).attr("height",height).style("font","12px sans-serif");console.log("SVG element created for Circle Packing:",elementId);const node=svg.selectAll("g").data(root.descendants()).join("g").attr("transform",d=>"translate(".concat(d.x,",").concat(d.y,")"));node.append("circle").attr("r",d=>d.r).attr("fill",d=>d.children?d3.interpolateViridis(d.value/root.value):"#fff").attr("stroke","#999").attr("stroke-width",1);node.append("text").attr("dy","0.3em").attr("text-anchor","middle").text(d=>d.children?"":d.data.name).attr("fill","#333");console.log("Circle Packing drawn for:",elementId);}// Draw visualizations directly using the data variables
console.log("Starting visualization drawing");drawTreemap(distritosCrData,'#treemap-distritos_cr');drawRadial(distritosCrData,'#radial-distritos_cr');drawPartition(distritosCrData,'#partition-distritos_cr');drawCirclePacking(distritosCrData,'#circle-packing-distritos_cr');drawTreemap(flareData,'#treemap-flare');drawRadial(flareData,'#radial-flare');drawPartition(flareData,'#partition-flare');drawCirclePacking(flareData,'#circle-packing-flare');drawTreemap(vueData,'#treemap-vue');drawRadial(vueData,'#radial-vue');drawPartition(vueData,'#partition-vue');drawCirclePacking(vueData,'#circle-packing-vue');
